snippet: An agreement on a five-year deal worth $100 million for Drew Brees, the star quarterback, arrives as the Saints are coming off an off-season of scandal and suspension.
abstract: New Orleans Saints and star quarterback Drew Brees reach a five-year, $100-million deal.
lead_paragraph: An agreement on a five-year deal worth $100 million for Drew Brees, the star quarterback, arrives as the Saints are coming off an off-season of scandal and suspension.

headline.seo: Brees Deal Is Rare Good News for Saints
headline.main: Brees Agrees to Sign, Giving New Orleans Rare Shot in the Arm
headline.print_headline: Brees Agrees to Sign, Giving New Orleans Rare Shot in the Arm
